metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4516 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
librdmacm 1.0.16, when ibacm.port is not specified, connects to port 6125, which allows remote attackers to specify the address resolution information for the application via a malicious ib_acm service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4516` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librdmacm1 - 1.0.16-1
rdmacm-utils - 1.0.16-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librdmacm package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.16-1').
